header.name: Branden Vennes
header.summary: Full-stack software engineer with 6+ years building scalable web applications and backend systems serving thousands of users. Proven experience architecting third-party integrations, data synchronization systems, and event-driven architectures using modern cloud technologies. Strong track record shipping production-ready features across streaming media, blockchain, and construction technology industries. AWS certified with experience scaling distributed systems and collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver innovative solutions.

experience.title: Software Engineer II
experience.detail: Architected and maintained a schema registry platform serving 50+ engineering teams with CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions and Jenkins, enabling safe schema evolution with automated compatibility validation and semantic versioning
Designed comprehensive data schema models using AWS Smithy enabling strongly-typed APIs across microservices, establishing consistent data contracts for distributed systems

Built multi-language SDK generation tools producing Scala, Java, and Python artifacts with automated JSON serialization using Circe, Jsoniter, and custom Python encoders, enabling seamless integration for internal and external consumers

Engineered a stream-snapshot state management system processing millions of real-time events from AWS Kinesis streams, integrated into a content metadata unification project serving millions of users across Disney+ and Hulu

Developed a Scala.js deployment orchestration tool that automated Spark job deployments by integrating with GitHub APIs, Jenkins, and CLI tools, streamlining the deployment workflow for data pipeline teams

Created data integration pipelines connecting AWS Kinesis streams to Databricks using Apache Spark, enabling real-time analytics dashboards and executive reporting tools for business intelligence teams

experience.title: Blockchain Platform Engineer
experience.detail: Built a transaction streaming service with RESTful APIs using Scala http4s and Cats Effect, MongoDB for transaction indexing, and Protobuf for efficient data serialization enabling real-time blockchain queries
Developed a React user interface providing transaction monitoring and blockchain data visualization to integrate transaction information into end-user applications
Designed and implemented a comprehensive HTTP management API for node configuration, cryptographic key management, and transaction signing providing secure access to blockchain operations
Architected distributed node communication using Akka actors and TCP networking protocols, implementing fault-tolerant peer-to-peer connectivity for a proof-of-stake blockchain network

experience.title: Software Engineer I & II
experience.detail: Developed full-stack features for a construction project management web application using C# .NET backend microservices with REST APIs and an Angular frontend serving thousands of daily users
Architected an event-sourced change management system storing user interactions as immutable events with derived application state, enabling complete audit trails and sophisticated business workflows

Built an integration synchronizing construction project data with the flagship enterprise resource planning application using Kafka streams, implementing bidirectional data flow with conflict resolution and error handling
Designed and implemented relational database schemas using MSSQL and Event Store, optimizing query performance for high-traffic endpoints
Deployed a microservices architecture to the Azure cloud platform with automated CI/CD pipelines ensuring high availability and rapid feature delivery

experience.title: QA Automation Engineer
experience.detail: Designed a test automation framework using C# enabling non-technical team members to define and execute comprehensive API and UI test scenarios, reducing manual testing effort
Built API testing infrastructure for microservices validation and a Selenium-based UI testing framework for browser automation including headless test execution
Executed performance testing and load testing to ensure system scalability and responsiveness, identifying and resolving bottlenecks before production deployments
